thread.title: Cozy rooms in Saint Germain
thread.title_full: Cozy rooms in Saint Germain - Review of Hotel des Marronniers, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: RaBaNaBey
title: Cozy rooms in Saint Germain
text: I was booked here for a conference at neighboring Sciences Po - quiet, comfortable, cozy (small) room and bathroom but properly equipped with toiletries, hair dryer, and wifi. Very friendly and accommodating staff. Continental breakfast was above average for a hotel (seriously delicious croissants).
